getPartialLineString

                                                                          double pct1,
                                                                          double pct2,
                                                                          int direction)
Retrieves a sub-linestring from pct1 and length = pct2

Parameters:
geom -
pct1 - => from pct
pct2 - => distance (in percentage) of second point
direction - 1=> same as geometry. 0=> Inversed
Returns:
partial linestring
